scripts.build:options: browserify -t coffeeify -t partialify coffee/browserify/options.coffee | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/js/browserify/options.js
scripts.copy:assets: cp img/icon*.png dist/img && cp js/vendor/* dist/js/vendor/
scripts.stripquery: find dist -name "*\?*" -exec bash -c 'for file do mv "$file" "${file%%\?*}"; done' _ {} +
scripts.build: npm run clean && wget 'http://0.0.0.0:8000/options.html' 'http://0.0.0.0:8000/welcome.html' 'http://0.0.0.0:8000/notification.html' 'http://0.0.0.0:8000/manifest.json' --mirror -nH -P dist || true
scripts.postbuild: npm run stripquery && kill $(< http-server.pid) && rm http-server.pid && npm run build:options && npm run build:coffee && npm run copy:assets
